Desc.eng: Oh, another beggar. Do you want some money?
No, my lady. Iâ€™m guarding my master's house.
You don't look like a guard.
I am one of the Borgovian Irregulars. I used to work for the greatest consulting detective in Borgova.
And where is this great detective now?
He fell to his death in a waterfall while he was fighting with his nemesis.
I just had this frightening idea... No, he couldn't have been a Domovoy.
